Posts.Content: Ehigs wrote: Hi, my mom was just diagnosed with Breast cancer on Friday, Nov 19th, 2010. We are going to see the breast surgeon tomorrow. We do not know what stage it is in yet.  My question is....does everyone get a second opinoin before making a decision on treatment?  I feel like I'm in a whole new world these past few days and just really overwhelmed. We can see a different doctor for a second opinoin in 2 weeks, but I'm not sure if we should wait. Any thoughts? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Does everyone get a second opinoin? Ehigs Ehigs

Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2010 08:21PM Ehigs wrote: Thank you Letlet.  That is very helpful and I'm really glad I found this site. Thank you and stay well.
Posts.Title: Does everyone get a second opinoin? Ehigs Ehigs

Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2010 10:19PM Ehigs wrote: Thanks all for the posts.  And that is so true... any good doctor should welcome a second opinoin.  Well i guess I'll see how the appointment goes tomorrow, I've never been so nervous before....
